reasoning: Medullary thyroid carcinoma (MTC) represents 3-5% of thyroid cancers. Global incidence estimated at 0.5-0.7 per 100k person-years based on GLOBOCAN 2005 data showing thyroid cancer at ~10 per 100k with MTC comprising minority. Confidence moderate due to heterogeneity across geographic regions and both sporadic/familial forms.
source: GLOBOCAN 2005 (IARC) - Thyroid cancer incidence with MTC subtype proportion
